metadata.title: CVE-2024-44961 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Forward soft recovery errors to userspaceAs we discussed before[1], soft recovery should beforwarded to userspace, or we can get into a reallybad state where apps will keep submitting hangingcommand buffers cascading us to a hard reset.1:https://lore.kernel.org/all/bf23d5ed-9a6b-43e7-84ee-8cbfd0d60f18@froggi.es/(cherry picked from commit 434967aadbbbe3ad9103cc29e9a327de20fdba01)
